name: JD Samson & MEN
description: '''JD Samson & MEN''', originally named simply '''MEN''', was a [[Brooklyn]]-based band and art/performance collective that focuses on the energy of [[Concert|live performance]] and the radical potential of [[dance music]]. MEN spoke to issues such as trans awareness, wartime economies, sexual compromise, and demanding civil liberties. The collective disbanded in late 2014.
